name: G. Kevin and Matrices
input: InputEach test contains multiple test cases. The first line contains the number of test cases $$$ t $$$ ($$$ 1 \le t \le 8\cdot 10^3 $$$).The only line of each test case contains three integers $$$n$$$, $$$m$$$, $$$v$$$ ($$$ 1 \le n, v, n \cdot v \leq 10^6$$$, $$$1 \le m \le 10^9 $$$).It is guaranteed that the sum of $$$ n \cdot v $$$ over all test cases doesn't exceed $$$ 10^6 $$$.
output: OutputFor each test case, output one integer — the number of matrices that can be friends with Kevin modulo $$$998\,244\,353$$$.
